pageContent: Purpose: Treatment of post-prostatectomy urinary incontinence (UI) and erectile dysfunction (ED) increases quality of life (QoL). Aim of our study was to evaluate the utilisation of care among patients with post-prostatectomy UI and ED in Germany.

metaData.source:
[The radiation oncologist, one of the actors in the patient's path after cancer. Follow up after prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31447344/
